readerPage.instruction: Take a moment to center yourself and focus on your question or intention. When you're ready, draw a card to receive guidance from the universe.
readerPage.tip1: Focus on a specific question or area of your life
readerPage.tip2: Take deep breaths and clear your mind
readerPage.tip3: Trust your intuition when interpreting the card
readerPage.tip4: Remember, tarot offers guidance, not prediction
readerPage.readingSubtitle: The universe has chosen this card for you. Take time to reflect on its meaning.
readerPage.uprightDescription: The card's natural energy and positive expression
readerPage.personalDescription: How does this card relate to your question?
readerPage.intuitionDescription: Trust your first impressions and feelings
readerPage.noCard: No card was drawn. Please try again.
readerPage.cardsNotResponding: The cards are not responding. Please try again later.
